proposal: Understanding the essence of fair token distribution through LightLink's LBP on Fjord Foundry, we see the value in aligning our B2B tools with your vision. Congrats on reaching 82 holders on the ETH network! Imagine enhancing your community's engagement with our customizable DEX, Lottery, or even a DAO for deeper governance. Let's make fairness in token distribution not just a goal, but a community-driven journey.
